summary: An Ordinance amending Section 9 of Ordinance No. 24392, entitled "An Ordinance regulating the installation and operation of electrical wires, appliances and apparatus in or about the buildings in the City of Seattle, and providing penalties for violation thereof", approved June 15, 1910, as amended by Ordinance No. 24837, approved August 17, 1910, for the purpose of eliminating fees for electrical inspection from and after the first day of January, 1913.
